tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester for cereal crop harvesting
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester to approach the first row of cereal crops
Adjust the combine's hydraulic knuckle boom system to reach the crops
Operate the combine's cutting mechanism to sever the cereal plants at ground level
Engage the combine's threshing system to separate grain from the chaff
Monitor the combine's grain auger to prevent overfilling or blockages
Control the combine's GPS navigation system to maintain straight rows
Adjust the combine's chaff spreader to distribute the residual material evenly behind the machine
Change the combine's cutter bar blades when they become dull or worn
Shift the combine's transmission to different gears as needed for varying terrain
Use the combine's barn unloader to discharge grain into storage bins when necessary

tasks.task: Load grain into trailers or trucks
subtasks: Guide the grain unloading hose onto the trailer edge
Operate the auger or loader to transfer grain from the combine to the trailer
Secure the grain load by leveling and covering to prevent spillage during transport
Fasten the trailer coupler to the combine for towing

tasks.task: Unload grain from the trailer at the farm storage facility
subtasks: Connect the trailer to the grain bin unloading system
Release the trailer's brake and activate the power take-off (PTO) on the tractor
Start the auger or star unloader to discharge grain into the storage bin
Verify proper operation of the unloading system and monitor grain flow
Stop the unloading when the bin reaches the desired level

tasks.task: Prepare the combine for transportation to the next field
subtasks: Perform routine maintenance checks (e.g., oil levels, tire pressure)
Clear any debris from the combine's augers and fans
Drain the fuel and apply stabilizer if the machine will be idle for an extended period
Cover the combine to protect it from the elements while moving to the next field

tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester for cereal crop harvesting
subtasks: Drive the combine to approach the row of cereals
Adjust the knuckle boom to reach the crops
Run the combine's cutting mechanism to sever the plants
Activate the threshing system to separate grain
Monitor the grain auger performance
Engage the GPS navigation system
Operate the chaff spreed system
Replace stale cutting blades
Shift gears as needed
Use barn unloading to store grain

tasks.task: Load grain into trucks or trailers
subtasks: Guide the grain hose to the trailer
Transfer grain using the auger/loader
Secure the load
Couple the trailer to the combine

tasks.task: Unload grain at the storage bin
subtasks: Connect the trailer to the bin system
Release the braking and activate PTO
Start the grain unloading system
Verify operation and control flow
Cease when bin is full

tasks.task: Set up the combine for moving to next field
subtasks: Perform maintenance checks
Clear debris from the augers
Drain fuel and add stabilizer if needed
Cover the combine for transport

tasks.task: Drive combine harvester to start harvesting
subtasks: Approach first row of cereals
Adjust knuckle boom arm height
Operate cutter bar to sever plants at ground level
Engage threshing system to separate grain
Monitor grain auger for clogs
Use GPS navigation to maintain straight rows
Control spreader to distribute chaff evenly
Replace dull cutting blades
Shift gears for different terrain
Use barn unloader to load grain into bins

tasks.task: Load grain into trucks or trailers
subtasks: Guide grain hose onto trailer edge
Use auger or loader to transfer grain
Secure load to prevent spillage
Couple trailer to combine

tasks.task: Unload grain from trailer into storage silo
subtasks: Connect trailer to unloader system
Release trailer brakes and engage tractor PTO
Start grain unloading auger
Check system operation and grain flow rate
Stop when silo is full

tasks.task: Prepare combine for moving to next field
subtasks: Check fluids, tires, etc.
Clear debris from augers and fan
Store fuel properly if not used
Cover combine for transport
